items.title: Capital One Financial Corporation (COF): CEO’s Going For A “Worldwide Card,” Says Jim Cramer
items.description: We recently published 10 Stocks On Jim Cramer’s Mind As He Gives Up On Becoming Fed Chair. Capital One Financial Corporation (NYSE:COF) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. Capital One Financial Corporation (NYSE:COF)’s merger with Discovery has made it one of Cramer’s favorite stocks in the banking industry. He is particularly enthusiastic […]
